#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define lint long long
int main()
{
    lint arr[8100];
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    arr[1]=5;
    int i=0;
    while(i<=8050)
    {
        if(i&1) arr[i]=arr[i-1]+5;
        else arr[i]=arr[i/2]*5;
        i++;
    }
    int n;
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%lld\n",arr[n]);
    }
}
